mapper.select: select * from ( select c.g_no as gNo, c.message as message, date_format(c.date, '%m-%d %H:%i') as date, c.count as aCount, u.nickname as nickname, u.image as image from chat c, user u where c.g_no = #{gNo} and c.u_no = u.no order by c.NO asc limit 100) as b order by b.date asc;
mapper.insert: insert into chat values ( null,#{gNo}, #{uNo}, #{message}, now(), #{aCount});
mapper.select: select c.no as gNo, c.name as groupName, d.readCheck as readCheck, d.readcount as readCount from user a, groupuser b, groups c Left Join (select b.g_no as gNo, a.u_no as uNo, a.read_check as readCheck, count(a.read_check) as readcount from accptalarm a, (select no, g_no from alarm) as b where a.noti_no = b.no and u_no=#{no} and read_check = true group by b.g_no) as d on d.gNo = c.no where a.no = b.u_no and c.no = b.g_no and a.no=#{no} group by c.no;
